abort.ezviz_cloud_account_missing: Ezviz cloud account missing. Please reconfigure Ezviz cloud account

error.mfa_required: 2FA enabled on account, please disable and retry

confirm.description: Enter RTSP credentials for EZVIZ camera {serial} with IP {ip_address}
confirm.title: Discovered EZVIZ Camera

reauth_confirm.description: Enter credentials to reauthenticate to ezviz cloud account
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

confirm.description:
Ezviz Alarm sound level service is deprecated and will be removed.
To set the Alarm sound level, you can instead use the `select.select_option` service targetting the Warning sound entity.

Please remove this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to close this issue.
confirm.title: Ezviz Alarm sound level service is being removed

service_deprecation_alarm_sound_level.title: Ezviz Alarm sound level service is being removed

service_depreciation_detection_sensibili.description: Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2023.12; Please adjust the automation or script that uses the service and select submit below to mark this issue as resolved.

confirm.description:
The Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2023.12.
To set the sensitivity, you can instead use the `number.set_value` service targetting the Detection sensitivity entity.

Please remove this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to close this issue.
confirm.title: Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is being removed

service_depreciation_detection_sensibili.title: Ezviz Detection sensitivity service is being removed

confirm.description:
EZVIZ PTZ service is deprecated and will be removed.
To move the camera, you can instead use the `button.press` service targetting the PTZ* entities.

Please remove the use of this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to close this issue.
confirm.title: EZVIZ PTZ service is being removed

service_depreciation_ptz.title: EZVIZ PTZ service is being removed

confirm.description:
Ezviz Sound alarm service is deprecated and will be removed.
To sound the alarm, you can instead use the `siren.toggle` service targeting the Siren entity.

Please remove the use of this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to fix this issue.
confirm.title: Ezviz Sound alarm service is being removed

service_depreciation_sound_alarm.title: Ezviz Sound alarm service is being removed

data.ffmpeg_arguments: Arguments passed to ffmpeg for cameras

level.description: Sound level (2 is disabled, 1 intensive, 0 soft).
level.name: Sound level

ptz.description: Moves the camera to the direction, with defined speed.

direction.description: Direction to move camera (up, down, left, right).
direction.name: Direction

ptz.name: PTZ

level.description: Sensibility level (1-6) for type 0 (Normal camera) or (1-100) for type 3 (PIR sensor camera).
level.name: Sensitivity level

type_value.description: Type of detection. Options : 0 - Camera or 3 - PIR Sensor Camera.
type_value.name: Detection type

sound_alarm.description: Sounds the alarm on your camera.
sound_alarm.name: Sound alarm

wake_device.description: This can be used to wake the camera/device from hibernation.
wake_device.name: Wake camera
